usually on my way home i stop at the store .
when i got home | i was hungry . i did n't want to cook | so i decided to go back out to the local taco hut .
output.sentences: On a dreary night like this, the man was happy to have so much money.
On his way home from work he decided to stop at the local store.
His faithful feline friend was interestingly named fannula.
Before going gome, he decided to stop by his local taco hut for dinner.
